mobi.cangol.mobile.service

接口 AppService

  • 所有已知子接口:
    AnalyticsService, CacheManager, ConfigService, CrashService, DownloadManager, GlobalData, LocationService, StatusService, UpgradeService
    所有已知实现类:
    AnalyticsServiceImpl, CacheManagerImpl, ConfigServiceImpl, CrashServiceImpl, DownloadManagerImpl, GlobalDataImpl, LocationServiceImpl, StatusServiceImpl, UpgradeServiceImpl

    public interface AppService

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
